titleStmt.title: Edinburgh, the ninth of January, 1685. Proclamation, annent [sic] heretors, masters and mistresses of families.
titleStmt.author: Edinburgh (Scotland). Town Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, printer to his most sacred Majesty, city and colledge,

notesStmt.note: Royal arms at head of text.
Signed at end: Jo. Richardson Cls.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.

person.persName: his most sacred Majesty, city and colledge
